title: Bug 371684type construction for signature makes mistakes with wildcards
OB: Bug 371684type construction for signature makes mistakes with wildcards If you have a type with multiple type params, like this:Foo<?,Tthe signature is:LFoo<TT;;and the handling ofis not working in TypeFactory.If that signature is passed in it will actually build:Foo<?having lost the second type parameter, this breaks code later that has expectations on the number of params.(e.g.
